Posts.Content: I had that happen to many years ago after my first mammogram. They did not have anything to compare it to so they called me back because I have dense breasts and calcifications. Just keep us updated once you get the second one done.
Posts.Title: mammorgram call back - first mammogram at 43

Posts.Content: I have been in that position a time or two myself. I have very dense breasts and many calcifications. From what I understand, calcifications are very common. I was concerned also but all was benign. I will be looking forward to sharing the good news with you on April 15.
Posts.Title: call back after mammo
